UA-2.name: User Authentication
UA-2.description: Handles user registration, login, and session management with enhanced security.
UA-2.verification_plan: Testing enhanced security features on both iOS and Android devices.

TM-2.name: Task Management
TM-2.description: Allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks with enhanced features like task prioritization and categorization.

embodiment.principle: React Native UI Components with Redux State Management
embodiment.description: Enhanced task management with state management for better performance.

TM-2.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate enhanced task management features.

PN-2.name: Push Notifications
PN-2.description: Sends personalized push notifications for upcoming task deadlines using advanced targeting.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Cloud Messaging with Advanced Targeting
embodiment.description: Personalized push notifications for better user engagement.

PN-2.verification_plan: Testing personalized notifications on multiple devices to ensure delivery and accuracy.

DS-2.name: Data Synchronization
DS-2.description: Syncs tasks across multiple devices using a cloud-based backend with real-time updates.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Realtime Database with Real-Time Updates
embodiment.description: Real-time data synchronization for enhanced performance.

DS-2.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate real-time data synchronization.

UI-2.name: User Interface
UI-2.description: Provides an enhanced user-friendly interface with a clean and modern design, including animations and gestures.

embodiment.description: Enhanced UI with animations and gestures for better user experience.

UI-2.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing with a focus group to gather feedback on the enhanced interface design.

TS-2.name: Task Sharing
TS-2.description: Allows users to share tasks with other users with enhanced access control and permissions.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Database Sharing with Access Control
embodiment.description: Enhanced task sharing with access control for better security.

TS-2.verification_plan: Testing task sharing functionality with access control across different users and devices.
